import React, { useState } from 'react' function Profile(props) { const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false) return (
setHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false)} className='avatar-img' src="/21-avatar.svg" alt="" /> {hovered &&
setHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false) } className='img-change'>
}
